org.zodiark.server

Class ZodiarkObjectFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zodiark.server.ZodiarkObjectFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.atmosphere.cpr.AtmosphereObjectFactory

    public class ZodiarkObjectFactory
extends Object
implements org.atmosphere.cpr.AtmosphereObjectFactory
    An AtmosphereObjectFactory that handles the injection of Zodiark's object. Field injection are discovered via the Inject annotation. Injection uses ZodiarkObjectFactory.Injectable and ZodiarkObjectFactory.Extendable implementation to discover what to inject and which default implementation class to use. Those default can be overridden by calling the extendable(Class, org.zodiark.server.ZodiarkObjectFactory.Extendable) and injectable(Class, org.zodiark.server.ZodiarkObjectFactory.Injectable)

    Injectable instances are EventBus, ObjectMapper, WowzaEndpointManager, StreamingRequest

    Extendable classes are AuthConfig, PublisherConfig, SubscriberConfig, RESTService

    Injectable and Extendable can be replaced.

    This class contains all default instanced used by the Service and object used by this framework. Override this class to replace the default object injection.
